Workdone:

Source was awesome, just adjusted the contrast a little and lightly used msu denoiser.

Audio:
For the audio on the other hand, was terrible. Thanks to Fanta for syncing, but it wasnt fully sync at the end which took a few cuts and paste here and there. Used MAGIX to clean up audio noise and audio enhancement to make it more bareable. Also replace left channel with right channel since it wasnt on the same levels. Took a few hours on this audio... So hope it good enough for you all till studio or Blu Ray comes out. ENJOY!
